short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy email links to your clipboard instead of opening the mail app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of having to right click and copy email addresses? So were we. Mail Clipper copies email links to your clipboard when you click them instead of opening your mail app. 

As a (free) bonus feature, Mail Clipper helps you to keep track of email addresses that you've copied. 

Mail Clipper is an open source project. You can see the source code here: https://github.com/Stack-Studio-Digital-Collective/clipboard-mailer
